title: When AI Goes WRONG!
description:
Well today we're jumping into the quirky and sometimes downright hilarious world of AI search results. Lets discussing how AI, more specifically Google's recent updates, may not always have the best answers. From bizarre responses to outright mistakes, join us for a fun and eye-opening look at the limitations and oddities of AI.

Check them out: https://engineeringgenerosity.com

ðŸ“ˆ Subscribe for more analysis on the evolving landscapes and more. Hit the bell for notifications on our latest videos.

ðŸ’¡ Like and share to spark a conversation on the future of the channel, our discussions and where this journey goes.

#search #ai #mistakes
